divs: Sighting DetailsMy condo faces the west. My wife was upstairs, I was downstairs. My wife yelled to me, "Look at that!" I looked out the patio door and saw three bright lights to the west. They were at a 45 degree angle, not very high in the sky, about a mile away. They were very close and silent. They were in a triangle formation (one at the top two below). The lights were equal size and brilliance. I stared at them for a couple of minutes. Suddenly, all three lights moved south about a quarter mile and stoppoed. The left bottom light flew west at a tremendous speed parallel to the earth and out of view. The other two lights stayed in place. After a minute or two, the third light returned as fast as it left. it stopped in place without a sound. All three lights move dnorth to their original position. The top light flew straight up at an unbeleivable speed until iy became as small as a star and disappeared into space. Me and my wife were yelling and screaming in excitement the entire time. Next, the other two lights, one at a time, took off int the same direction as the first and diappeared into space. I knew the object was a UFO. No sonic boom. Some time later, the news reported the objects as UFO's at the Military Air Show and showed them on TV "once." I waited to record the next news broadcast. Never heard it again. Can't find anywhere.
